column1: Have things got so bad for Ringo Star, that he's reduce to telling me about alternative delivery options?
Not everyone lives in the USA. We don\u2019t have either DropSak or Bucks.
Nope  - you can only get things sent to lockers that anyone can order. Restricted items - e.g. knives have to be sent to the home address. Next.

Thank you for sharing this video, we recently got the Amazon Lockers at our local grocery stores around the US. And your video helped me to know what to expect and how easy it is to use! Waiting on my package for my first Amazon Locker use:)
+Alp Tigin yes I've seen them driving around in their van every now and then.

Well I'm an American, but if I weren't comfortable with leaving packages on my porch while I'm not home (many Americans aren't, but I have cameras on mine so I'm not worried), or if I didn't have Prime I  would consider using this because I could pick up packages in Chicago. In some circumstances this would cut a day or two out of shipping time (3, on a weekend or holiday). I'm just over the border, in Indiana, only a 30 minute drive from Chicago, and I often have other things to do there anyway. Prime makes my packages come so quickly that it's pointless for me, but it WOULD be helpful for packages coming from companies other than Amazon...
+Fox McCloud\xa0They have that here too - this locker location has gone now because the shop closed :-(
Dude needs to know that this video is over a year old (see dates of previous comments).\xa0
You can also use Amazon Locker for returns as well and there is no charge for shipping! I just did this last week, it was the easiest online return I have ever done.
It was a year or so ago...but I think it was a Sony AS10.
Yes there are a few restrictions. It's only items Fulfilled by Amazon and I've noticed pre-orders can't be sent there either (or Vinyl albums because they are "too big").
+Techmoan\xa0we have those boxes since years in germany for our local post company (DHL) :D
I'm in the UK, so it's new here (or was when I first upload this video a year ago).\xa0

To celebrate the fact that Youtube.com/techmoan has passed 20 Million Views and as a result has wasted over 125 years of mankind's time watching my videos - I've decided to make a few old unlisted videos public (because I don't have time to do anything better right now). It's a double celebration as this channel will be 5 years old on 31 May 2014.
It's the Sony AS10. The perfect handheld camera for shots like this.
Only a couple so far. Just niche interest items and hastily assembled videos.
Hey! Next time please don't pull and shake stuff you could break something and ruin it for other people
Love Amazon lockers. When it works \U0001f600
Man how are you awake at this hour \U0001f631
How much does it cost to use one of their lockers........
+Insane Insomniac\nThanks
That is cool. Ha, my name is McNally. Watch for an Instagram post.
